events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because it doesn't meet my needs.
The customer's message indicates a request related to refund due to incorrect product delivered, categorized under Refund.
Assigning the refund specialist to handle the case and ensure prompt processing of the customer's request.
Hello, I am sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I will be assisting you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number: 123456789, and I have attached the picture showing the incorrect item I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email once completed.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue swiftly.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
We wanted to follow up and confirm you have received the refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund issue has been successfully handled, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
